frontend.label: HTML + CSS + JS
frontend.description: Pure vanilla JavaScript with HTML and CSS. No frameworks, just the web platform.

frontend.label: React
frontend.description: The most popular library for web and native user interfaces. Component-based and declarative.

frontend.label: Next.js
frontend.description: React framework with SSR, SSG, and API routes. Frontend-first but can handle backend logic.

frontend.label: Vue.js
frontend.description: The Progressive JavaScript Framework. Approachable, versatile, and performant.

frontend.label: Nuxt.js
frontend.description: Vue framework with SSR/SSG capabilities. Intuitive and powerful developer experience.

frontend.label: Angular
frontend.description: Platform for building mobile and desktop web applications. Complete framework solution.

frontend.label: Svelte
frontend.description: Cybernetically enhanced web apps. Compiles to vanilla JS for optimal performance.

frontend.label: Astro
frontend.description: All-in-one web framework for content-driven websites. Ship less JavaScript.

backend.label: Node.js (runtime)
backend.description: JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine. Server-side JavaScript execution.

backend.label: Express.js
backend.description: Fast, unopinionated, minimalist web framework for Node.js. Industry standard.

backend.label: Node.js + Express
backend.description: Most common Node.js backend stack. Flexible and widely adopted for REST APIs.

backend.label: Fastify
backend.description: Fast and low overhead web framework for Node.js. High performance focused.

backend.label: NestJS
backend.description: Enterprise Node.js framework with TypeScript. Scalable and maintainable architecture.

backend.label: Django
backend.description: High-level Python web framework. Batteries-included with ORM, auth, and admin.

backend.label: Flask
backend.description: Lightweight Python web framework. Minimal and flexible for API development.

backend.label: Spring Boot
backend.description: Enterprise Java framework. Production-ready with robust ecosystem.

database.label: MongoDB
database.description: Flexible schema NoSQL database. Document-based and horizontally scalable.

database.label: Firebase Firestore
database.description: Cloud-hosted NoSQL database from Google. Real-time synchronization.

database.label: CouchDB
database.description: NoSQL database with seamless multi-master sync. JSON document storage.

database.label: PostgreSQL
database.description: Powerful open-source relational database. ACID compliant and enterprise-grade.

database.label: MySQL
database.description: Popular open-source relational database. Fast and reliable for web apps.

database.label: SQLite
database.description: Lightweight embedded SQL database. Perfect for small apps and prototypes.

database.label: MariaDB
database.description: MySQL fork with enhanced features. Drop-in replacement with better performance.

fullstackCombinations.label: MERN Stack
fullstackCombinations.description: MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js - The most popular JavaScript full stack.

fullstackCombinations.label: MEVN Stack
fullstackCombinations.description: MongoDB, Express, Vue, Node.js - Progressive framework meets flexible database.

fullstackCombinations.label: PERN Stack
fullstackCombinations.description: PostgreSQL, Express, React, Node.js - Enterprise-grade with reliable SQL database.

fullstackCombinations.label: Next.js Full Stack
fullstackCombinations.description: Next.js with API routes or separate backend. Flexible database choice.

fullstackCombinations.label: Backend API Only
fullstackCombinations.description: Pure backend API for mobile apps, SPAs, or microservices architecture.

fullstackCombinations.label: Static + API
fullstackCombinations.description: Simple static frontend with REST API backend. Lightweight and fast.
